Description:
Can't find page hints exception displays wrong pagenumber

Steps to reproduce:
1. get ReportEngine folder
2. type in command line:
genReport --mode render --output Test.html --page 10 --locale "en" Test.rptdocument
The report document is from test.rptdesign which is inside WebViewerExample folder, the report only has one page.

Expected result:
严重: Can't find page hints :{10}

Actual result:
Page number inside brace is wrong
严重: Can't find page hints :{0}
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Can't find page hints :{0}
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RenderTask.setPageNumber(RenderTask.java:577)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RenderTask.render(RenderTask.java:105)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.renderReport(ReportRunner.java:350)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:158)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:118)

Please also update error message to:
 "Page xxx is not found."

"Page hint" is an internal structure that is of no interest to the end user, and should not be mentioned in externally visible error messages.

Please also note that the use of abbreviated forms of words, such as "can't", "don't", "isn't", etc., is discouraged in externally visible messages. Instead use "cannot", "do not", "is not".
